title: Curtis Samuel - Wikipedia
snippet: He played college football for the Ohio State Buckeyes, winning the 2015 College Football Playoff National Championship and earning All-American honors in 2016. snippet: The Panthers played in their 11th game this season decided by eight points or fewer. They're now 3-8 in such games and are one shy of the franchise record (12) set in 2003. ...
